website_summaries.verdict: This keyboard gives users the ultimate control over their smart TV with an impressive 92 keys. Between that and the convenient touchpad, it’s a valuable purchase.
pros: Automatic sleep mode preserves battery life
Ranges in compatibility as it works with PC, Mac, Xbox 360/One, PS3/4, Android TV Box, and more
cons: Wireless range isn't as expansive with this keyboard as it is with others

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why I hesitated to buy this!! It is awesome! Super lightweight, nice soft feel to the touch, connected to my computer stick (W5 Mini PC Stick, Windows 10...  without having to do a thing. I thought it would be awkward to use the mouse and/or type with but it’s as natural and easy as can be. Don’t hesitate. This product is a huge value for the price. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: justshrug

customer_reviews.title: Great HTPC keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great HTPC keyboard. Easy to use with Windows Media Center for watching TV and movies. I use this in the living room sitting on the couch with ease. I previously had the 2017 version of the i8+ and while everything is similar to that version, this new version doesn't have the issue where when you wake up the keyboard, you have to wait 3 seconds for it to re-connect which got annoying. This version instantly wakes up.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard+trackpad combo unit
customer_reviews.text: Using this currently for a home theater computer in the living room, it worked perfectly just plug and play. The computer recognized it right away. Its nice and lightweight which is something I was looking for, and the fact that it is rechargeable was a big plus. The buttons have a good "click" feel to them and are decently sized and placed. All the shortcut keys seem to work as well. All around great product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE NEEDS ONE OF THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! Got it for my boyfriend as one of his Christmas presents & he loves it too! Very, very responsive! Got it in 2 days thanks to prime, very durable, super fast, beautifully made, & you don't have to worry about changing batteries like regular remotes! Just plug it into it's charger and boom it's working again! Another thing we love about this keyboard remote is that up top in the middle, it has a mousepad that works exactly like a lap tops does! Double tap it it'll select what you're trying to select, Use two fingers and slide down on it it'll scroll down. Just absolutely geniously made and very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, effective and tiny
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my HTPC setup. The battery lasts at least a month in regular use and it's super responsive. No range issues in a large living room. I've actually replaced my first unit which was damaged by kids repeatedly dropping it, and I'd do it again without a thought. I also bought one for my nephew so he can drive his laptop when it's plugged in to the TV, thus contributing to the laziness of a post-teen, but it made him happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Broge

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed with my little Rii i8 2.4 GHz keypad. Good range, small, nicely lit keys, easy to use, convenient, Linux compatible, long battery life, USB charging, tiny dongle. I especially like the media keys and the three different ways the "mouse buttons" can work (touchpad, near top, and on the side). It has two light-levels which is nice, but I wish it remembered the light level chosen previously when it is power cycled. The keyboard is larger than a game controller, but smaller than a DVD case. The lighted keys are a nice bonus when using it in a darkened room. A very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best gadget I have bought all year!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a portable computer I need to access when I am in the field. This Keyboard and mouse combo delivers big time with a solid wireless connection in a compact format. Typing is easy and fast and all the function of the mouse are built in! Its small enough to fit in my pocket, although that is not necessarily where I would keep it. It is lightweight that it could get easily crushed if sat on or something, but I think it could survive a 1meter drop. This is also great for Amazon TV type devices where you have to type on screen and such. Great to keep laying around since its smaller than remotes.
customer_reviews.author: James Klein

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly on the Nvidia Shield
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Nvidia Shield. Easy to setup, plug in USB receiver (dongle) and you are ready to go. I have had mine for a month and I still have not recharged the battery!
customer_reviews.author: Newt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect HTPC companion
customer_reviews.text: I went from HTPC->Roku->HTPC->Sony Android TV ->fire stick->chromecast->nVidia Shield TV-> and back to HTPC. Having big bulky KB isn't as good as having a little remote like had on the other devices. This unit is a good mix of size and functionality going back to HTPC. The arrows are perfect for Plex and Kodi. The Touchpad is kinda finicky but I'm not sure if it's because of my callouses or if it's just the nature of it. It's usable though and lasts for a full day+ of watching TV. I'll grab another if this ever dies.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Squabbles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a computer/tv streaming setup!
customer_reviews.text: This little keyboard is awesome, especially for the price! After using the first one for several months, we got a second for our TV downstairs. (We mostly stream from a computer to our tv, so this was ideal). The buttons on the keyboard seem small at first but are no problem to use. I also like the fact that it tucks away easily when you don't need it (sometimes a little too well!), unlike the full-size apple keyboard we had been using previously. Another bonus is that the batteries are rechargeable. Great little device!
customer_reviews.author: Seastrong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your HTPC
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found this product. I've re-purposed a business class HP ProDesk Core i5 4590 I got on eBay, and turned it into a home theater PC (HTPC). I wiped the hard drive and installed Linux Mint 18.2, I'm using this Rii i8+ as the keyboard / mouse and it works amazingly well. The size is near perfect,the back lighting is great for those night time moves. I have usb cable attached to htpc to keep it charged. 1 slight issue that I've had is the mouse/touch pad - for some reason only my left thumb works while others in the family do not have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need something that feels good in the hand
customer_reviews.text: This little keyboard is just what I needed to work with my Raspberry Pi, it even hooks up to my Nabi Big Tab HD and my other android devices without issue (using OTG cables). If you need something that feels good in the hand, operates well for being as small it is, and especially for a single board computer (SBC) with USB ports or through adaptors. Look no further. And the backlit keys on this makes it wonderful to work with in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Curt L. Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Works great without a hitch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to enter passwords easier on my tv and to sometimes chat on TwitchTv. It evens works on the Raspberry Pi3 if you need to type in something. It has a sleep mode if a button hasn't been pressed in a while. Long battery life is a plus. My only gripe is that there is only one shift button on the left side but similar keyboards by other companies have the same issue. Maybe it's a space issue or maybe I'm seeing thing wrong. Nevertheless, it works great as intended!
customer_reviews.author: TooCasualDX

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my FireTv
customer_reviews.text: Nice little gadget! It has an easy to hold matte black finish, backlit keys that are big enough to see and use with my thumbs. There is a mouse pad and clicker keys, function keys and a ton of other keys and buttons I don't use or even know what they are for! Oh, it stays charged for a long time. I use this mainly for android apps side loaded into the firetv - Chrome, Overdrive, one-click digital, and audible. It also works on the main screens and menus.
customer_reviews.author: soSew

customer_reviews.title: You will love it once you get accustomed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet little remote to run your HTPC, streaming device, etc. After you get used to the keys, its almost like second nature and ergonomically it is great. The range on the Bluetooth dongle is good as well (10ft+). I have replace a mouse and keyboard on my HTPC in one room, and replaced my NVidia Shield remote in another with these. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: mde8965

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for my Fire TV and Kodi :-)
customer_reviews.text: TURN USB DEBUGGING OFF under Settings, device, developer options!! (on the Fire TV). Otherwise it won't work! This keyboard is just the right size to leave laying around on the coffee table. Love the backlit option. No bluetooth necessary. Need a USB port for the wireless dongle. Fire TV has one of course.
customer_reviews.author: Turbo Tony

customer_reviews.title: Rii remote,  backlit,  for Amazon Fire TV Box (not fire stick)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this remote. It works my off brand smart tv (Hisense) as well as my Fire Tv box. Setup & pairing 15 minutes or less. I wish it would control my sound system but its older than everything else (no usb ports). Love that it's backlit. Very light weight and small for my small hands its great. I don't think it's tough/sturdy enough to take the abuse of small children like my grandkids who chew on, step on, hammer on, throw, ... every thing that has buttons or a screen. My grandson (3 yrs old) can take things apart that you wouldn't think could be.
customer_reviews.author: TG.Saphiry

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Kodi!!!
customer_reviews.text: I now own two of these controllers. If you use Kodi/Android TV box this controller is a must have. The touchpad is surprisingly responsive and the backlit keyboard is great at night. Ive had no problems with range and the battery life is exceptional! If you found this review to be helpful please indicate so. If there's something missing, or you'd like additional info, don't hesitate to ask. I write these in the hope that it will help other buyers make a decision with so many similar products available for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Small connection radius, but works
customer_reviews.text: Works ok for what I needed, but has an extremely small connection radius. I use this for a media computer and I have to be within 5' of the computer for it to catch every key entry. The amazon description shows both a 15' and 15m radius, which are completely different distances, but I have found it looses full connection at 10' with nothing blocking its view.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Works with Linux and Windows
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of these I've bought. It works with my Raspberry Pi, my Linux Ubuntu 16.04 computer and my Windows 7 Laptop. These are nice small keyboards with a touchpad and other dedicated media and scroll keys. I wouldn't want to type war and peace on one of these but they are good for mobile applications and media centers or a "headless setup" where you just need to make a few changes. I'm doing another Media Center Setup and will be using one of these on that. The backlight features makes it perfect for media centers in dark rooms
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: the tracking is bad. everything els fine besides getting a different model.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item based on the pictures. the product I got, twice was not what was pictured. the one I wanted had a power button, a slightly different key layout, and red sub-functions for the keys instead of blue. I may have kept it IF the tracking was not completely awful, even the slightest amount of pressure on the pad would cause it to read a single finger as two causing it to scroll up and down rather then travel around the page. since this device has dedicated keys for scrolling this seems like something they could have left out of the product. refunded both
customer_reviews.author: Timmy metal ferret man

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't support FireTV specific functions like "Home" shortcut.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the keyboard you want for your FireTV!. The keyboard doesn't really work with FireTV like one would hope. For example, the "home" key on the Rii keyboard doesn't take you to the FireTV home screen. There isn't a mapping for other remote specific keys like "menu", I didn't get to the point of testing other buttons such as play/pause. The keyboard did send text to FIreTV, but I was hoping for something more like a keyboard that would support the FireTV remote, a keyboard, and a mouse all rolled up into one.
customer_reviews.author: drmutus

customer_reviews.title: Very functional, but no a substitute for small keybaord
customer_reviews.text: The button / key layout is very nice. I wish there was a shift key on the right side though. Kind of a pain having to hold in both hands while pressing down shift with left thumb and reaching over with right index finger on other hand to to press buttons like 1 though 5. Also, I don't like that the amber light that constantly flashes while the buttons are pressed, it's distracting, when holding down shift button while pressing other ones. It's really too small to utilize for anything other that short little tasks while sitting on my couch (can't form any lasting muscle memory). Still, a nice little functional keyboard.keypad for short tasks on my TV-monitor.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTopheR

customer_reviews.title: Faulty unit - updated
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these units for my Android boxes, one works great and this one is faulty. The touchpad and mouse refuses to function properly after 2 hours of use after a full charge. Once I charge it it works fine, then suddenly after a couple of hours of use it just suddenly stops responding. The battery low charge light never comes on. My other one will go for several days. I have emailed Rii support 2 times over the last week and there has been zero response from the company. Very disappointed with this unit, only 5 months old Updated: Seller promptly sent me a replacement keyboard witch works excellent, it should. Thank you for resolving my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: STOP PAID REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: All of these 5 star reviews (including mine) were paid for in exchange for a free unit. The unit stops working well within a few months, sporadically disconnecting and becoming laggy. It has a very irritating sleep mode which requires you to wake it up by pressing a key and waiting about 5 seconds - very annoying for a keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Touchpad sucks. Battery drains in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.text: Really bad product. Battery drains very fast and has a old model charge port so you cant use a regular USB cable (which really really sucks), you have to use theirs and its short. Touchpad is REALLY unresponsive and obviously drains the battery like a ton of bricks. The pause/play wheel is awkward and often gets mistaken for the other click wheel and movies are accidentally restarted instead of skipped back 10 seconds. Cheaply made, poorly designed junk. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but you still need your original remote...
customer_reviews.text: Smart TV: I plugged it into my smart TV, functionality was intermittent at best. Only some functions worked and only with some apps. You'll still need the TV remote for most normal functions so overall, not worth it for the TV. XBox: Works as a keyboard, but you'll still need the controller, plus the one designed for the Xbox functions more seemlessly. Playstation: Same as the Xbox Computer: A standard keyboard and mouse or even laptop track pad will work better. Overall not worth the money spent, I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Gideon Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Unsuitable for TV Box
customer_reviews.text: What the Hell. I bought this to replace my old rii Keypad which worked well for several years. This is supposed to be an "updated" version. Does that mean "screwed up"? Several changes severely handycap it. 1. No backup key. It has the old backspace key called "Back" which serves the purpose of the old back arrow key but not always. Very frustrating! 2. No Stop playing key. So for the life of me I don't see how to cancel a recording in progress. 3. No menu key. I was able to get to a menu somehow but then couldn't get out! This may be related to item 1 (no backup key). Back she goes!
customer_reviews.author: Discriminating

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device, near-perfect for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I love this device... it's ergonomic, lightweight, has a pretty good range (much better than the Bluetooth version), and looks great. It worked well with my Windows 10 laptop, Android tablet, and Samsung smart TV. My star knock-off is because I can't seem to reassign the 4-way button pad to function as a "mouse", moving the pointer cursor around the screen, in place of the touchpad. There is no driver for the device so I don't see any functionality to enable this feature. If anyone can prove me wrong, I'm listening! Barring that, I'm very happy with this device!
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Item is Garbage Seller Disappeared
customer_reviews.text: Product connects intermittently, battery life is garbage with light use, touch pad dies and needs to be restarted before work again and best of all attempts to contact seller have been unsuccessful. Their email address is bogus, phone number has VM that states a different phone number, and dont bother contacting via their sellers page because you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at just how small this was when I pulled it out of the package. I was absolutely not expecting something the size of my palm but it works great. The bluetooth receiver was hidden in the back of the handset in what looks like a location for a battery and when I plugged it in the unit started working immediately without issue. The mouse control is intuitive and easy to use and I especially appreciate the physical mouse buttons at the side of the screen. Also like the fact that this is backlit and chargeable via the included USB cord. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: tmkreutzer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mini keyboard. It has a very long battery life (although I have the habit of turning it off between uses from the old one I owned). It is textured so it's easy to keep ahold of (unlike the cheaper ones on the market that are smooth and are hard to keep ahold of) More powerful than the factory remote that came with my device. The only downside I can find with this keyboard is that the battery isn't replaceable and once it's used up you'll have to buy another keyboard. But if you remember to remove it from the power once it's changed it should last you a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Byrd

customer_reviews.title: I must just have the wrong type of Smart TV because the only thing that works is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I must just have the wrong type of Smart TV because the only thing that works is the direction keys can't even get the volume to work. On my Xbox one I can navigate kodie pretty well but still need the xbox controller to turn it on so a may as well use my controller. I'm sure with the right product this thing works. Just not for me. Where this product is a major fail is the manual. Little to no instructions. You are on your own to explore the internet and YouTube to figure out the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: Only works partially, read this to understand!
customer_reviews.text: Partially works. It handles most keyboard functions when used for typing/pointing onscreen/online. It does not control the cable box. Not sure why I thought it would. It controls the TV only and even then, some of the keys are indifferent :) ie: the keys you would expect to do something do not yet a different key altogether may control that function I'm not going to return it however. It does make access on YouTube, Pandora, Amazon much easier on the TV than trying to accomplish the same using the 6 button TV remote
customer_reviews.author: W. Linnert

customer_reviews.title: This beauty works!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use for my PC connected to my TV. It’s size is pretty good, though the keys are a little cramped. But overall it is a nice little gadget for $20! The trackpad is pretty responsive and the media keys and app keys for opening browser, music, and home directory are handy. I’ve used it two days most of the day on a single charge. Reception is great with no lag I can detect. Glad I bought it, would recommend if you want a “living room keyboard.”
customer_reviews.author: Nitewing '98

customer_reviews.title: Recommended nice and functional
customer_reviews.text: The right small size. Very functional and easy to use. Installation is instant on my Win10 PC which is connected to my large TV via HDMI. The space bar (with blue markings at the center bottom)--I use it to wake up the device (but it also stops/resumes video play). I am guessing that it also changes the pointer speed (?) More and clearer instructions are needed. Perhaps a diagram of the device explaining important keys would be nice. The instruction booklet can use a much larger font (I have near 20/20 eyesight). The lighted keys are a must-have feature for any such device and this one even has two lighting levels, nice.
customer_reviews.author: Farm girl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is my first keyboard that really works. I bought other keyboard brands, one never worked, but was so cheap I didn't bother with it. The other worked very good, but some of the keys were unresponsive. This one is sturdy, and the key gives a positive response. In addition, the keys are illuminated. But the illuminated time is short. At the moment I'm in my first charge. I would like a user replaceable battery instead, but nothing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Best accessory for CNC machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my shop laptop that controls my Shapeoko CNC machine. It’s simply used mostly just to job the machine controls and operate a few of the other keyboard shortcuts. It’s small, connects easily, and is simple to use. I am using this with Carbide Create so I can’t speak on how it works with other software, but this has been one of the best accessories I’ve purchased for my Shapeoko.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good for basic use
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought this just to surf the web and for that it works just fine. Sometimes the buttons do not respond and I would type a letter and it will not add so I would have to go back and re-type. The mouse pad also has a small glitch where when I would swipe across and it will only move a small distance. The verdict is the keyboard/mouse pad works well just don’t expect to play games on it. I think it will be a big disappointment in that department.
customer_reviews.author: Indira Y Grullon

customer_reviews.title: Not working w FireTV
customer_reviews.text: It is not compatible with none of my Samsung Smart TVs or with FireTV, which is the main reason I bought it for. I followed the instructions, I even called fireTV support and wasn't able to get it to pair and connect. I tested with a PC and that worked, but it doesn't for fireTV which is what I need it for. So, if you are looking to buy this for your TV, you will struggle. I also sent an email to the manufacture and havent heard from them, so that is why I am giving 1!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andres Norena

customer_reviews.title: It does the trick, mostly.
customer_reviews.text: The range is frustrating, it loves to 'click' a button 15 times in a row randomly. I goes into sleep mode quickly but isn't hard to wake it up. The battery, with only occasional use, is about 8-9 days; even if turn it off when not using it. I really miss the 1st generation of this remote I bought 4 years ago; but replacing the battery caused it to stop working. Furthermore, this remote does NOT have a replaceable battery,
customer_reviews.author: Erik Wollum

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life, durable, touchpad is trash
customer_reviews.text: Touchpad: Lol, you wanted to move in THAT direction? Let me twitch that way, go backwards, than click 3 times. It turns using the product into a very frustrating experience. Other then that the device is great, but the touchpad is a VERY critical piece of why I purchased this device.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Reusch

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with Fire Stick
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and feels good, but got it for my Amazon Fire Stick. Other customers told me it works with the Fire Stick but it doesn’t. You need to buy a special cable to plug into the Fire Stick which allows you to plug the wireless adapter into the Fire Stick. I’m ordering one and it’s only about $5 on Amazon. I’m sure once I get that it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: very nice little keyboard for the money it does everything i need. Couple of thing that should be changed tho, back light timer is way to long i think it takes 1 minute for it to go off, should bring that down to 20sec. Also the status LEDs are way to bright especially the blue one that. when you use the kayboard in the dark, that thing is blinding. other then that awesome keyboard
customer_reviews.author: hobo

customer_reviews.title: trackpad is worthless
customer_reviews.text: The trackpad on this keyboard is one of the worst I have ever used. As an IT person that deals with trackpads quite often that is saying something. Outside of that, the keyboard does what it says and all the other functions seem to work well. Up to you to gamble your $20.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Note: This is not a Bluetooth model
customer_reviews.text: I can't really blame Amazon for this, but the manufacturer's naming scheme leaves a LOT to be desired. There are apparently two versions of this keyboard both called "Rii i8+ mini"...one has Bluetooth and the other has to be used with a USB dongle. I wanted to use this on the new fire stick 4K, but using the cable and USB dongle supplied with this device does not seem to work. I really wish that the product title for this device stated that it does not have Bluetooth. Not exactly false advertising, but it is very confusing since another device that looks nearly identical has different features.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Pros: size , just right light weight easy to turn on/off can use on TV that has USB port to type in search fields Touch pad is textured for better feel Cons: Haven't found any +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Am using it on PC I have in garage to control listening to music Best used with stylus pen.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Using it for a laptop that is part of my den media center. Works without issue. It is a little cumbersome trying to type on such a small device but, that's the trade off over having to store a full size keyboard. The sleep mode kicks in a little to soon for my liking but that is my biggest complaint. Battery life is fair.
customer_reviews.author: TomM

customer_reviews.title: Nice features, love the backlighting, easy to use and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Good range, small, nicely lit keys, easy to use, convenient, Linux compatible, long battery life, USB charging, tiny dongle. I especially like the media keys and the three different ways the "mouse buttons" can work (touchpad, near top, and on the side). It has two light-levels which is nice, but I wish it remembered the light level chosen previously when it is power cycled. Can't read the blue "Fn" writing on the black unit at all.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless keyboard and controller. I use it with an android box for my TV. Works flawlessly and smooth. Back lit feature is great for using at night or in the dark. Has lots of options and works way better than the remotes that come with the boxes. Has mouse feature in the middle to use with fingers for scrolling. Easy to set up. Just connect small USB to box or any other device and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Not working completely!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this model before with good luck but the latest version has 4 letters on the keyboard which do not work. Got this for an android box so that I did not have to use the pop up on screen keyboard. Other features work OK except for the touch pad. It is very hard to use the drag feature and the app will close or do other weird stuff when dragging 2 fingers. I would send back but already dumped the packaging before I came across the keyboard issue.
customer_reviews.author: AndyB

customer_reviews.title: The response time SUCKS. The backlight is neat
customer_reviews.text: This remote looks really neat out of the box. We purchased it to use with the G TV box (Kodi). Unfortunately the reception drops every time you put it down, you have to hit a button and then it has to re-establish connection, then it will let you actually USE a button. The response time SUCKS. The backlight is neat. If you are a console gamer, I HIGHLY suggest NOT buying this as the D Pad is on the RIGHT side... which is very frustrating. The only thing useful on this remote is the keyboard, that is IT. Anything else including the touchpad is a pure pain in the arse.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Scooper

customer_reviews.title: Check compatibility before order
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very well thought out design. Exactly what I've been needing. I will be saving it for future use. Be sure to check compatibility before ordering. I did not and cannot get it to work with my TV as it's not compatible. That's my own fault and I want to make that clear as to not give the Rii a bad name because it really is a perfect design and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C.

customer_reviews.title: Something Has Changed In The Function,or I received a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in Dec, 2017 and it works perfectly on my Shield. I didn't have to use the dongle to pair it as it paired without it. I bought another one looks identical for my son and you (must) use the dongle on his Shield and the mouse pad will not respond. It may be defective, So now I have to replace it with another or another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Frank here...

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mac Mini Home Theater!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with an older Mac Mini (Core2Duo) that I use in my living room. works great but sometimes it has a hard time connecting the trackpad on wake up. But it corrects itself fairly quickly. I replaced a Logitech DiNovo with this and haven't looked back. The backlit keyboard is really nice and the extra mouse buttons and page-up/page-down buttons make navigation and file management easy!
customer_reviews.author: imkimc

customer_reviews.title: Defective item received
customer_reviews.text: Good: It was an easy transaction. Received the item on time. Item was not damaged. Followed instructions and charged it, no problem. USB receiver was present. Pairing was a breeze, paired with a computer running Windows 10. Bad: I tried to login to the computer and couldn't login using the keyboard. Launched Microsoft word and started typing each key. At least 5 keys were not working. Unlucky me! Received a defective item. Light weight, 3 minutes auto turn off is annoying. Not good for Windows shortcuts, etc. Probably a good keyboard for devices that usually doesn't come with a proper keyboard. I'm not getting a replacement and opting for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for Media Center PC's
customer_reviews.text: Price paid: $19.95. I did not have to install any drivers to get this to work under three major operating systems. I use it about 40 feet away from my PC to show movies and send other content to my television. I love the touchpad because you can scroll and emulate a right-click with a two-finger tap. It automatically shuts off after a few minutes of inactivity.
customer_reviews.author: angieNort

customer_reviews.title: Great $20 wireless keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty awesome! Small and light. Has a rechargeable battery and a USB cord that doubles as an extension cord for the wireless receiver as well as a charger for the keyboard (it has a USB type-A female connection for the wireless receiver and a USB type-A mini or micro male end to charge the keyboard) and they can be used simultaneously. The touchpad is a bit shoddy, but for $20 I'm ok with it. Everything else it does and has makes up for the not so great touchpad.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Milano

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little keyboard that I have used both on my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little keyboard that I have used both on my computer and for my Roku video streaming box attached to my smart tv. When I say small, It measures about 4" x 6" and unless you are adept in texting on your smart phone, I would not reccommend. The keys are small, and are not back-lite, so it tends to be difficult to use in the dark. The touchpad works well and tracks seamlessly. I would reccommend only for people adept in smart phone texting, as i believe seniors might have difficulty with this unit. otherwise, It's a great LITTLE device that serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic little keyboard. I use it for my Raspberry Pi HTPC and it has made the experience so convenient. The backlight makes night time watching easier as you can actually see what you're trying to type. The range on the wireless adapter seems fine, though I'm only ever approximately 6-8 feet away from it. I read that the previous model had a replaceable battery, which I would have liked to see here. Overall, this keyboard is a great choice if you're looking for something for your single board computer setup.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life, sturdy built keys
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality keyboard. There is one minor issue keeping the fifth star off, and that is key mapping on android. Some of the keys do not perform the function illustrated on their face in android. There are mapping workarounds online to fix some of these keys, so this isn't a dealbreaker. The good features include long, long, battery life and backlit keys that feel sturdy and respond properly. I've read complaints about the mini usb for charging, but it ships with the required cable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe_Waters

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!  Consider this unit over the others out there...
customer_reviews.text: I use Kodi (if you don't know what that is, look it up), and like with most internet streaming boxes that come with a traditional remote, I found it frustrating to use the built in buttons to navigate. This product has alleviated those frustrations. It's a little mini keyboard and mouse that work as it should. A couple of things to consider with this vs. the rest. The internal battery is rechargeable via the USB cable that comes with the unit. And more importantly (for me) is the backlit keyboard. It's a great option that this manufacture added that allows you to see the separate keys in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this a solid 9 out of 10. The only thing I'd change is having the keys a little easier to depress. I do a LOT of typing (on standard keyboards) and am starting to get some CTS symptoms and these keys are a tad firm. It does work great and on both windows and even my Raspberry Pi's it was as simple as plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: NoahBody

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: When streaming programs and have to type, it is SO much easier to use the mini-keyboard than the search and click on screen with the g-box remote. However, my one complaint is that you cannot type unless the little blue light on the left under the round key (series of 3 lights) is flashing. Sometimes, this means typing a letter, waiting a few seconds (3-6) for it to flash blue again, and then continue typing. A friend ordered the same setup, and she has the same issue - so I don't believe it is my unit in particular. Overall, it's a decent product, and would definitely recommend if you have a g-box.
customer_reviews.author: DPT

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first but stopped working after 2 months :(
customer_reviews.text: Originally it worked, but after a little over 2 months it randomly stopped working. Overall, it looks good, but is very light. My experience makes me thing it isn’t worth more than 5$. I flip the on/off switch and either it doesn’t turn on or when it turns on nothing works. Quite disappointed because this was the recommended device to buy together with the Beelink gt1 Android tv box. My recommendation is to spend more and pick up another device.
customer_reviews.author: J_Mas

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Trash
customer_reviews.text: This device was great at first. The set up was a little odd, but once I got it connected it did everything I needed. About 2 months down the road it just started becoming erratic - none of the buttons worked and it was sending button signals even when I wasn't touching it. If I turned it off, all the erratic mouse button presses stopped. Needless to say, the idea is great but product quality is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It worked great! For the first eight hours that is
customer_reviews.text: It worked great! For the first eight hours that is, until the led backlights started flickering continuously. The only way to get this to stop was to turn off the backlight in altogether, which is one of the reasons I selected this model. Thought it might just need an overnight charge - although I'd fully charged it before using it and it's supposed to be able to go for a couple of weeks between charges. No luck. Still flickering after a full night's charge. Please send one without this issue and I'll gladly revise my review to 5-stars, because this unit is otherwise awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Paul D350

customer_reviews.title: REALLY short range but works out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could connect my Macbook to my tv and access it from my couch. It worked out of the box no problem and is really small and light, which was nice. The negative and reason for removing 2 stars is the range, which is REALLY short. It basically works within 4-5ft of the receiver, so in order for it to work from the couch I have to sit on the edge and lean as far over the living room table to get closer as possible.
customer_reviews.author: shadedhue

customer_reviews.title: A 5 star product with 1 star reliability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this less than 5 months ago (October 16, 2016). The product is well designed, with good build quality and ergonomic shape. Unfortunately it stopped working about a month ago. It no longer powers up or charges. I only charge it with the USB cable and front HP PC USB port, so I am not sure what went wrong. It no longer works on my other PCs so I understand that the Rii itself is defective. I would expect a product like this to last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedside
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bedside. The keyboard is full, Function keys and Ctrl Alt Shift. The mouse pad is straight forward and precise, and in the upper left are easy to navigate Media Center controls. Internal rechargeable lithium battery. 2.4GHz USB dongle. A special USB cord allows charging while still using. Just a super little device. -June 2020 update: I've since purchased a couple more, to use, and as a kind of hedge against future unavailability or failure. I still like this gem as much as the day I first used it, it still takes a full charge, and I still use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best gadget ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this keyboard! My hands are small so I have no problem with the tiny keys. I'm able to sit anywhere in my living room with great reception - no problems with connection at all. Furthest I've been is 22 feet and still no problem. I've only had it about a week and I've used it everyday so I can't really say anything about battery life. I turn off the device when I'm not using it. I LOVE the backlight also! Convenient when watching a movie at night - I don't have to get up to turn on the lights to see what I'm doing. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Works GReeaatt!!!
customer_reviews.text: The purpose for this purchase was for Amazon Firestick. After reviews and YOU TUBE pairing issues, thought I was doomed. Come to find out after trail and error few times and adapter purchase, this is a GReeaatt investment. it works flawless after figuring out which buttons are operational for Firestick device. No more toggle up/down... can just type in.RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Everett Blunt

customer_reviews.title: Great suggestion, Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This does not work well with the Fire TV. I don't know why Amazon would have suggested this as a best seller when I typed "fire tv keyboard". It does work, but some of the buttons do not do what they are supposed to, so you have to find out where the real OK button is. The qwerty keyboard does not work at all for any 3rd party apps. So you will have to resort to fishing for letters and numbers the same way you did with the default remote on YouTube. Oh yeah, this is the best- there is no OK button for Hulu, so you will still need your old remote for that.
customer_reviews.author: aaronical

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I would like using this or not. I use my PC as my entertainment center and I hated when I needed to use a keyboard. It meant getting up or using a virtual keyboard, both of which sucked. Now I use this as my mouse and keyboard, and have been since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a super helpful USB wireless keyboard for things like occasional use with Raspberry Pi, Xiaomi Mi Box, or setting up computers. You wouldn't want to type much with it, but for basic things like entering passwords, getting headless Linux boxes set up, etc, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: 2nd unit is the charm? Crossing fingers
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Mini-Keyboard I've owned and absolutely love it. I use this with my VPCab and it is slick. The lighted keyboard is nice too. Not sure what happened but the LEFT mouse button went haywire and acts like it is being held down, but isn't. The blue indicator light is also blinking like crazy. Easy Peasy return to Amazon but negates my Next Day delivery when I have to order another one to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Benson

customer_reviews.title: good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The "enter" key doesn't actually enter or submit and entry, just scrolls more. Other than that it works good. With this particular model, the dongle plugs into the back of my FireTV's usb port. This isn't Bluetooth. Update: Took back two stars because it eventually stop communicating with the dongle and the yellow light consistently blinks, so it doesn't respond with the FireTv. Tried googling for a fix, still have keyboard as of Feb. 23, 2019 but hasn't been used in close to or over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Gezie1287

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in 2019
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I was originally worried about the battery life because I saw a few other reviews that were unsatisfied with it. While I only use the keyboard casually, the battery has lasted for over 6 months on one charge! To be fair I only use it to stop and play movies from my couch in the living room and to send instant messages while playing video games. Highly recommend! :D
customer_reviews.author: TheForceReborn

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Got this around Christmas and it's dead. The keys worked for a while then started failing. Tonight the dongle got stuck in my laptop and then game apart while trying to remove it. I will never be purchasing one of these again, this was the 2nd one that has failed. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for Android tv boxes and smart tvs
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and in time. A must have for Android tv boxes and new smart tv sets. Worked well with my new Samsung 55" smart tv, makes browsing and entering passwords so much easier. No Wi-Fi problems, hooked up immediately. Battery lasts a long time. Slight learning curve, YouTube tutorials a big help. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: doityourselfer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and love them. It has a great feel and did not need any configuring when plugged into a Windows 10 desktop. The buttons and product overall feel solid, and it works really well. I leave it in standby, rather than turning it off, and the battery lasts for weeks. If you are looking for tiny wireless keyboard, you can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Xylem

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but can't use as wired keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a tiny wireless keyboard an trackpad. However, I bought it to set up a Raspberry Pi, and unfortunately you can't do the initial OS extraction using the wireless connection, and the USB cable is only for charging. So the keyboard cannot function as a corded keyboard. Works as intended, wirelessly, after the OS is installed.
customer_reviews.author: cbad

customer_reviews.title: Great remote
customer_reviews.text: I love the Rio version of these remotes. I had the first one for about 2 years and after many drops it finally gave up on me. I bought another brand and between me and the kids dropping it, that one didn't last 3 months and it wasn't backlit.. So I'm back with this brand and a bumper around it. Hopes it lasts as long as the first one and longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rawls

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived without charger or dongle?
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this keyboard before and really like it, So I ordered a replacement when old one wore out after a few years of usage. The new one arrived in a plastic bag? No box,charging cable,Dongle or instuctions? So it cant get power or talk to the computer? Waiting on replacement to arrive and will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Nolte

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I purchased this when buying my GBOX
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I purchased this when buying my GBOX. So far I have charged it once since I bought it in January and have not had to charge it again. The home button on it however does not work on the gbox, so I do need to keep the other remote around to go back to the home screen or return to the previous screen. I love the mouse, and this makes it so easy to search for things or enter in any of my account login information. At first I was a little put off by how tiny it really is, but then now I think it's pretty cute and super easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! I get lots more use out of my laptop hooked up to my tv.
customer_reviews.text: This mini keyboard remote works great! I get lots of more use out of my laptop hooked up to my tv. I was using a PlayStation 3 (not playing many games) to watch things on Netflix but now it's almost obsolete since I can do all of that on my laptop. If I had one complaint it would be not mouse wheel. It would be nice when you are on a website or scrolling through menus to have a mouse wheel to navigate instead of the loud arrow keys on the right or the touch pad. Other than that it's a great purchase and device.
customer_reviews.author: charlie sims

customer_reviews.title: Nice Format, Performance Lacking
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard has a nice form factor and very lightweight, but comes with flaws. Intermittently drops connection and some characters do not output so I often find myself re-typing things. Does not work on all devices, and especially poor function on my Xbox One S and Amazon Fire TV (which is the reason I bought this). Suggest looking somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good for now
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping that this one will outlive the last one I had ordered of the same maker/style. It worked really well for what we needed just not super durable. I know this one is new but I can already tell the battery life is about the same and it does feel about as lightweight as the old one-- hence the 4 stars in those areas.
customer_reviews.author: Eva W.

customer_reviews.title: Working, could be better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a very similar unit I recd with GooBangDoo android tv type box. It works but doesnt turn off or on. I bought a second to use with XBox and its pretty good. I am still learning how Xbox works-I only bought to use as streaming device.
customer_reviews.author: Williams S. White

customer_reviews.title: I love these keyboards
customer_reviews.text: I love these keyboards. They normally have great range and reliability. I had a problem with one and returned it and will order another. Most work great. If you have issues just return and reorder. They should work great to 25 -30 feet without issue. If not there is an issue that needs replacement. Amazon has no hassle replacement for occasional quality issues. Again, highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Coater

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard for Raspberry Pi
customer_reviews.text: Using with a Raspberry Pi, great little keyboard. I have larger hands, device fits well and is easy to use with both thumbs. Find that I can type easily and the touchpad works well for navigating graphic interface screens. Still trying to get the hang of using shift key, functions same as keyboard where has to be held in which is difficult when just using two thumbs. Wish they made a carry case so I could protect keyboard while on the go.
customer_reviews.author: VerbalCVMA

customer_reviews.title: Will work if you are not more than 2 feet away
customer_reviews.text: Constantly searching for signal. Will work if it's not more than 2 feet away from box. Have to press buttons four-five times... Very frustrating. Also all those functions on keyboard will not work. Only numbers and letters will make sense. Mouse is not what we used to have. Touch pad is not really a touch pad. Better get regular keyboard and mouse for this price. Sending this one back. May be it worked for someone else and mine was just defective. But idea was great...
customer_reviews.author: svkru

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, plug n play!
customer_reviews.text: I use a laptop plugged into my TV for entertainment. This remote is a perfect addition. It was plug and play, no drivers or setup needed.. Moron proof. Fully functional keyboard and mouse built into a small package. No more getting off the couch. :) Update : product still performs nicely. Keep in mind your fingers and the touchpad must be clean, it is very sensitive to grease and oil.
customer_reviews.author: Triston Murray

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any PC based media setup
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for! I bought it replace a similar version I purchased several years ago. There are multiple left and right mouse buttons to make it easy to pause most media. There are also media buttons for the windows media player. (Media buttons can also be used with Linux, though some additional configuration may be required) Haven't tested the full extent of the range, however I used it in a hotel room where the beds were far from the TV and it worked great. This is not a TV remote, i was using my laptop connected via HDMI. Definitely a great value, a must get for any PC based media system.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Moss

customer_reviews.title: Works even better than I hoped it would!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It works perfectly. I use it as a tv remote since I have my pc connected to the living room TV. I didn't even know there was such a thing as this mini keyboard. I was looking for a full size keyboard and mouse that my kids couldn't destroy. This thing I can easily keep out of reach so the kids can't even touch it! I especially like the back lit buttons. Everything works exactly as the other reviewers said it would. I'm very satisfied and would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional, but small
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard gave me the ability to surf the internet on my smart TV, which is ideal for video-heavy content such as YouTube. The keyboard works well, and feels well-made, but I wish I'd paid more attention to the size before I bought it. This keyboard is small: fit-in-the-palm-of-your hand small. Think of it as a remote with touchpad and QWERTY keypad, and you're on the right track.
customer_reviews.author: Hans F. Von Milla

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I received it as a brand new item. I was able to connect to my device to see if it would work and it did... then i read that it needed a full charge. So i charged it, yet it will not charge. The yellow light continues to blink which is the battery indicator and it will not do anything. I read that it has "AAA" back up so I thought I would change it out and ***There are NO Connectors*** in the AAA Slot for the batteries to work. Meaning, there is nothing there to make an electrical connection with............ Totally disappointed. So now i am having to buy replacement batteries before i can even use it....
customer_reviews.author: Jan Maupin

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not for typing in Search Boxes on Streaming Applications
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with TV Internet access, but unable to type letters into Search Boxes for HuLu, Netflix, You-Tube searches on a SMART TV or SMART DVD Player. This is Not a fault of the Keyboard, but a limitation in the SMART TV Software that can only use the TV/DVD players remote for Search Typing. Other than that issue which is what I bought the Keyboard for, It works very well and is a Quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake Company
customer_reviews.text: I bought twice same year and tried every other controller, they only make it work long enough to pass the 60 day return policy so they can’t help you. I contacted both amazon and rii no help with warranty and did nothing. They change the words into the customer damaged it. You guys need to design battery life to last longer than 3 months and find better service agents.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic portable keyboard for my service work
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic portable keyboard for my service work. Often systems I encounter are touchscreen only, and it can be a pain moving files or updating the system without a keyboard. This thing is compact, has the usb dongle safely secured in a slot underneath, and works very well with all keyboard and mouse functions. My only 1 star reservation is that the battery is always dead every time I pull it out to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Q
